summary: A Big Tower Player Home within a breathtaking scenery
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b][color=Dodgerblue]Ravens Nest Tower[/color][/b][/size][/center]

[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1222074-1395183626.jpg[/img][/center]

A big tower for the player, located near Kagrenzel on top of a cliff.
ItÂ´s fully navmeshed, needs no DLC and was cleaned with Tes5edit


[youtube]nzN7RFTlDLg[/youtube][youtube]AzEQSPbbJ4A[/youtube]
[youtube]a1F4uO-aTJs[/youtube]

[size=4][color=Dodgerblue][b]Features:[/b][/color][/size]

Everything you need for an adventurous life in Skyrim

- Horse stables
- Breathtaking scenery
- Kitchen area with lots of custom storage
- Lab with lots of custom storage
- Nice living area
- Two follower beds
- Many bookshelfs
- Many chest
- Many display cases
- Lots of mannequins
- Basement with big smithing area
- Wine cellar
- Display-museum area
- Old dwemer bath

[size=4][color=Dodgerblue][b]Spoiler:[/b][/color][/size]
To get the key, search for a chest near the main door!

[size=4][color=Dodgerblue][b]Requirements:[/b][/color][/size]

Skyrim up to date

[size=4][color=Dodgerblue][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]

Extract RavensNest.esp and RavensNest.bsa into your Skyrim Data folder

[size=4][color=Dodgerblue][b]Suggested mods:[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49710/?]aMidianBorn Imperial Forts[/url] (makes the tower look awesome)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38491/?]aMidianBorn Whiterun[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5265/?]Enhanced Noble Furniture[/url] (Makes the interior look much nicer, including red beds!)

[b]Credits:[/b]

* InsanitySorrow for his awesome modders resources
* Tamira for her beautiful Statue model and resources
* Oaristys & Tony67 for their wonderful modders resource pack!
* FPI Research for jars resource

...thanks to Tamira for testing, Darkfox127 for the tutorials and Hodilton, Nozi87 and Sidras for the awesome vids!
author: Akhorahil666

added custom armor storage
